TopicTitle: How will 1.1 affect modelling, or will it?

Articles.Content: I'm thinking of starting doing modelling (I have an idea or two), but I've heard some things changing about how models work in 1.1 with Unity 5.2. So, I'm not sure if I should dive in now or wait if the update is going to affect models.
It'll mainly affect plugins, models probably not at all, so no need to wait.

Okay cool, good to know. Thanks.

I know wheels might be affected in some way or other, but I'm not worried about that since that's not one of my ideas.
more important question is... when will PartTools get update?
Yeah, we'll need new PartTools, with emissive curves fix and probably new shaders.
